name: Landphil
details:
Bass distortionThe Landphil is the signature bass distortion pedal for Landphil, the bassist for the badass cossover thrash band Municipal Waste and killer death metal band Cannabis Corpse! It is a modified and much more tweakable version of the Blower Box Bass Distortion. It has the same awesome HI/LOW-boost/cut, distortion and volume controls as the original but has an extra control for each giving a much wider range of bad ass bass distortion tones!
https://www.idiotboxeffects.com/product/landphil
